trip.name: Baltic Sea Tour 2013
trip.description: During the summer of 2013 two guys cycled around the Baltic Sea. They started in Norrköping, Sweden and also end the trip there. 2 months, 9 countries and 8000 km.

sections.description:
1) Valid passport: CHECK 
2) Application form: CHECK 
3) A photo: CHECK
4) Invitation letter: CHECK
5) Copy of the passport: CHECK
6) Copy of the insurance policy: CHECK
There is nothing that can stop us. Appointment at the consulate on Friday at 10am.

Headwind till Nyköping, downwind from there till Stockholm. 2 punctures. Started at 10.45, which was rather late, so we were in Nyköping at 3, and still had 100km before us. Arrived finally 21.15 at Karro.

gallery.caption: The first puncture just before Nyköping

sections.description: Beautiful city. All those nice islands. The gammal stan is great to visit – reminded me of Venice.
